Challenging, suspenseful, very fun. If horror is your thing, this is for you. If horror is not your thing but it's not a deal-breaker and you love challenging games, this game is for you as well. 10/10

游戏的可玩性很高，而且有很多技巧  带有心理博弈这个游戏的上限很高，主要在于屠夫和人类的对抗，对于人类来说，需要高度的配合团队才可以为团队对抗屠夫并且胜利逃生做出最大贡献。 而屠夫需要在破坏人类维修发电机并且拖迟人类逃生，在追杀过程中所考虑到的更便捷的追杀路线  ，因为屠夫要一个人对抗一支四人队伍，所以对于屠夫来讲技术要求可能会更高。 而最有趣的是可以自定义房间，可以五个好友一起玩。

La película Soul brinda un mensaje a las personas en plena pandemia, una época en que la enfermedad y la muerte está muy presente: hay que aprovechar la vida.

Producida por Pixar Animation Studios y estrenada en Disney+, la animación dirigida por Pete Docter narra la historia de Joe, un profesor de música que sueña con dar un concierto de jazz.

Hundreds of hours wasted on a game the devs don't care on feedback, everything you say fall on deaf ears, even Fog Whisperers lose their status if they utter a single critique. Yet i am addicted and i cannot stop, like a toxic relationship or a drug addict chasing the magic dragon, i cannot stop.

Side note. It's a great game if you overlook the bugs and ignorant devs.

Good game with shit tier matchmaking and game breaking bugs.

I love this game to death and I love it, I truly do. However, if you are looking for a fair experience and a welcoming player base for all, new players and veterans alike, you'll probably want to look elsewhere. Survivors who are Rank 1 getting paired with and against new players is not okay, and having a Rank 1 killer against 3 noobies and a veteran is not okay.

Behavior, fix your fucked matchmaking. Offer rank rewards, and make them actually good.

I have ~500 hours in this game in total, counting console hours, and as said before I love the game. I just cant recommend it.
This game makes me laugh, scream, rage, cheer, and sigh, and I can't stop playing it.

O jogo é bom mas tem varios erros são eles:

- A mairia dos perks sao inuteis, e isso te força a comprar multiplos sobreviventes/assassinos que voce provavelmente nem vai usar só pelos perks, e mesmo podendo desbloquear os mesmos no santuario nao vale a pena pois é aleatoria e so atualiza a cada 4 dias e custa 2000 pra 1 perk sendo que com 9000 voce compra um perssonagem com 4 perks (mesmo tendo que upar)

- a comunidade é uma merda como a maioria dos jogos competitivos e fato de so ter "ranqueada" so piora

- o sistema ranked do jogo é uma merda e desbalanceado colocando pessoas de rank 1 conta rank 20 

tirando isso o jogo é bom afinal eu n teria 400 horas com ele se fosse ruim

I am a highly skilled rank 3 Dead by Daylight (DbD) player. If you have played with me, you will know I am highly skilled and maybe one day you can achieve my greatness at this game Dead by Daylight (DbD).



As a professional at this game, Dead by Daylight (DbD), I only play it and nothing else, to make sure my skill level is at its best at all times.



If I am killer and facecamped you it is because of one of the following reasons:



You used flashlight in a toxic way (Blinded me)

You pallet stunned me when I picked up a survivor

You tea bagged against me

You cleansed my Devour Hope totem

You finished gen in front of me before I could grab you

You hook dived and your teammate got away because of Borrowed Time (BT)

You play Blendette

You rushed gen too fast

You are using Object of Obsession (OoO), a very troll perk



As a survivor, I WILL make sure you lose with my high skill if you:



Use Noone Escapes Death (NOED)

Stay within the hook more than ten seconds (I COUNT!!)

Camp a generator

Try to 3-gen the Survivors (survs)

Play the Spirit

Play Wraith and uncloak while chasing

Hook someone in the basement as Leatherface

Use Iridescent Hatchets as the Huntress

You play Ghostface and don't get revealed when I am looking at you (Hacker!!)

Find me when I am hiding even when I use Iron Will

If you go back to hook after someone is rescued (G-O F-O-R G-E-N-S NOOB)



If you stick to these very simple rules of conduct in Dead by Daylight (DbD), everyone will have much more fun and maybe one day you can become as skilled as me.



See you in the fog.

12/10 GOTY 
-IGN
